entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump You want 2put ppl 2work in the middle of a lethal pandemic?  It’s a good thing you weren’t in charge in WWII. You’d hv pulled out w/in 2 mons, upset we weren’t making your luxury cars anymore, &that Americans sacrificing their conveniences, made you look bad.  Gutless wonder! https://t.co/AWSL9RsHFS
